BeforeInstallPromptEvent.summary: CAUTION Non-standard The BeforeInstallPromptEvent is the interface of the event fired at the object before a user is prompted to "install" a website to a home screen on mobile.

remarks.para: This interface inherits from the interface.

-Making PWAs installable
-How to provide your own in-app install experience on web.dev (2021)

BeforeInstallPromptEventBeforeInstallPro.summary: CAUTION Non-standard The BeforeInstallPromptEvent() constructor creates a new object.

remarks.para:
-Making PWAs installable
-How to provide your own in-app install experience on web.dev (2021)

BeforeInstallPromptEventPlatforms.summary: CAUTION Non-standard The platforms property of the interface lists the platforms on which the event was dispatched. This is provided for user agents that want to present a choice of versions to the user such as, for example, "web" or "play" which would allow the user to choose between a web version or an Android version.

remarks.para:
-Making PWAs installable
-How to provide your own in-app install experience on web.dev (2021)

BeforeInstallPromptEventPlatforms.value: An array of strings, in which each string identifies a target platform for the installation.

BeforeInstallPromptEventPrompt.summary:
CAUTION Non-standard The prompt() method of the interface allows a developer to show the
install prompt at a time of their own choosing. Typically this will be called in the event handler for the app's custom install UI.

remarks.para: This method must be called in the event handler for a user action (such as a button click) and may only be called once on a given BeforeInstallPromptEvent instance.

-Making PWAs installable
-How to provide your own in-app install experience on web.dev (2021)

BeforeInstallPromptEventPrompt.returns: A resolving to an object containing the following properties:

BeforeInstallPromptEventUserChoice.summary: CAUTION Non-standard The userChoice property of the interface represents the installation choice that the user made, when they were prompted to install the app.

remarks.para:
-Making PWAs installable
-How to provide your own in-app install experience on web.dev (2021)

BeforeInstallPromptEventUserChoice.value: A which resolves to an object containing two properties:
